cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7647, Supreme Court Ethics, Recusal, and Transparency Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 73 (Tuesday, May 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JOHNSON of Georgia:
H.R. 7647.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Article I, section 8,
clause 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H4714]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 16.

title: Supreme Court Ethics, Recusal, and Transparency Act of 2022
